tool_description: Calculates population, housing, and development density metrics for land use analysis and planning assessments.

land_use_data.description: Land use classifications for each parcel

area_measurements.description: Area of each parcel in acres

housing_units.description: Number of housing units per residential parcel

floor_area_ratios.description: Floor area ratios for commercial/mixed-use parcels

exclude_vacant.description: Whether to exclude vacant land from density calculations

density_units.description: Units for density reporting: per_acre, per_square_mile, per_hectare

error_messages: Data length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length as land_use_data.
Invalid area measurements: All area values must be positive numbers.
Invalid population data: Population counts must be non-negative integers.
Invalid housing units: Housing unit counts must be non-negative integers.
Invalid floor area ratios: FAR values must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid density units: Use one of [per_acre, per_square_mile, per_hectare].
Insufficient data: At least one parcel must have non-zero area for density calculations.
usage: Provide land_use_data and area_measurements as required arrays. Add population_data, housing_units, or floor_area_ratios for specific density calculations. Set exclude_vacant and density_units as needed.

overall_density.description: Overall development density for the analyzed area
